name: Generic Document
description: Extract all text and information from any document without predefined structure. Best for unknown or custom document types.
prompt_template: Extract all visible text and information from this document. Analyze the document and return a JSON object with two fields: 1) 'full_text': a string containing all the text you can read from the document, maintaining reasonable formatting and structure. 2) 'detected_fields': an object containing any structured information you can identify, such as names, dates, numbers, addresses, ID numbers, or other key-value pairs. Use descriptive field names. If you cannot identify structured fields, return an empty object for detected_fields. Do not wrap the JSON in markdown code fences.
